description: Try our easy to follow Easy Banoffee Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Banoffee Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g gluten-free plain dark chocolate, shaved or grated

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the crushed biscuits between 4 tall glasses.
Spoon the caramel into each glass, then scatter over the banana slices.
Top with the cream and decorate with the chocolate. Serve immediately.
